name: Anomaly Loop
description:
You woke up and found yourself in an anomalous endless place from which it is not so easy to get out.
Carefully observe your surroundings to find a way out of this place.

Do not overlook any anomalies.

If you find any anomalies, turn back immediately.

If you don't find any anomalies, don't turn back.

Be careful if you find a red room!

This game was inspired by "Exit 8", we are trying to make it more interesting and elaborate.
